```{r}
alumnos <- c(1, 5, 1, 1,1, 3, 4, 2)
pie(alumnos,radius=0.8)
```


```{r}
Titulaciones<-
c("Matemáticas","Físico","Químico","ADE","Ingeniero","Estadístico","Informático","Economista")
pie(alumnos,radius=0.8,labels=Titulaciones,cex=1)
```

Mostrarlo en porcentajes

```{r}
etiquetas <- paste0(round(100 * alumnos/sum(alumnos), 2), "%")
pie(alumnos, labels = etiquetas,radius=0.8)
```


```{r}
Titulaciones<-
c("Matemáticas","Físico","Químico","ADE","Ingeniero","Estadístico","Informático","Economista")


etiquetas <- paste0(Titulaciones,"_",round(100 * alumnos/sum(alumnos), 2), "%")
pie(alumnos, labels = etiquetas,radius=0.8, lty = 2,col=rainbow(length(Titulaciones)), cex = .6)
title(main = "Diagrama de Sectores", sub = "Estudiantes Master",
      cex.main = 2, font.main = 2, col.main = "darkgreen",
      cex.sub = 1, font.sub = 2, col.sub = "blue", line = 1)
legend("topright", legend = Titulaciones, fill = rainbow(length(Titulaciones)), cex = .5, 
       bty = "n", 
       border = "red", 
       title = "Grados",
       title.cex = 1,
       title.font = 4,
       title.col = "blue"
       )

```

```{r}
library(plotrix)
```


```{r}


etiquetas <- paste0(Titulaciones,"_",round(100 * alumnos/sum(alumnos), 2), "%")

pie3D(alumnos,
      labels = etiquetas,
      labelcex = .5,
      labelcol = "red",
      explode = .15, 
      radius = .7,
      col = rainbow(length(Titulaciones)),
      border = "white")

title(main = "Diagrama de Sectores 3D", 
      sub = "Estudiantes Master",
      cex.main = 1.5, 
      font.main = 2, 
      col.main = "blue",
      cex.sub = 1, 
      font.sub = 2, 
      col.sub = "purple", 
      line = 2)

legend(x = -0.8, y = 1,
       legend = Titulaciones, fill = rainbow(length(Titulaciones)), 
       cex = .5, 
       box.lty = 2,
       box.col = "blue",
       box.lwd = 2,
       title = "Grados",
       border = "black", 
       title.cex = .5,
       title.font = 4,
       title.col = "blue",
       ncol = 3
       )

```
